text: Valmont is a 1989 drama movie starring Annette Bening. It is based on the French book . This movie received an Academy Award nomination for the Best Costume Design. ==Sources== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1989 romantic drama movies Category:French drama movies Category:1980s British drama movies Category:1980s English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Milo≈° Forman
